

```{r}
data <- fread("limpieza/limpio/anillamiento.csv")

duplicate_anilla <- data$Anilla[duplicated(data$Anilla)]

# Find duplicated rows based on Anilla
duplicated_rows <- duplicated(data$Anilla) | duplicated(data$Anilla, fromLast = TRUE)

# Subset the dataframe to include only duplicated rows
duplicated_data <- data[duplicated_rows, ]

# Check if all columns are exactly the same for each group of duplicated rows
all_same <- apply(duplicated_data, 1, function(row) {
  all(duplicated_data[1, ] == row)
})

# Print the duplicated rows with exactly the same values
duplicated_data[all_same, ]
```
